analysis.description:
Token.airDropCoin has external calls inside a loop:
	- address(owners[i]).transfer(balanceOf[owners[i]] / _value) (/unique_contracts/0x003ffefefbc4a6f34a62a3ca7b7937a880065bcb.sol#203)

Token.airDropToken has external calls inside a loop:
	- assert(bool)((Coin(_tokenAddr).transfer(address(owners[i]),balanceOf[owners[i]] / _value)) == true) (/unique_contracts/0x003ffefefbc4a6f34a62a3ca7b7937a880065bcb.sol#206-209)

TokenERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x003ffefefbc4a6f34a62a3ca7b7937a880065bcb.sol#37)
